items.translated_title: Paramount goes to war with Netflix for Warner Bros. Discovery with hostile $108.4B bid
items.content: Paramount Skydance on Monday launched a hostile, $108.4 billion bid to buy Warner Bros. Discovery, days after Warner Bros. agreed to be acquired by Netflix for $82.7 billion.

images.alt: Madrid headquarters of IBM International Business Machine, the American multinational of informatics and technology consulting services in Madrid, Spain

items.content: IBM is buying data infrastructure company Confluent for $11 billion in cash in a bid to bolster its data and automation products as ever more companies move their tech operations to the cloud and deploy AI technology.

items.title: How would the Netflix-Warner Bros. deal reshape Hollywood?
items.creator: Anthony Ha
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: How would the Netflix-Warner Bros. deal reshape Hollywood?
items.content: It’s only been a day since Netflix announced an $82.7 billion deal to acquire Warner Bros., and the acquisition has already been described as sending Hollywood into “full-blown panic mode,” “possibly a death blow to theatrical filmmaking,” and maybe even “the end of Hollywood” itself.
